ai-ja223:1.2_0: She should do her duty to one doing his duty,
ai-ja223:1.3_0: (But) she need not do good to one wishing her harm,
ai-ja223:1.4_0: No one need love those who do not love (in return).
ai-ja223:2.1_0: would not do what should be done,
ai-ja223:2.2_0: She need not love the one who is devoid of thought.
ai-ja223:2.3_0: Knowing that a bird was poor,
ai-ja223:2.4_0: Can seek out another (tree) in this great wide world.”
ai-ja223:3.1_0: The third droping of the robe-cloth is finished.
